description: “Passing away” or “passing through”? Changing funerary attitudes in the Peloponnese at the MBA/LBA transition. 27 Metaxia Papapostolou ‘Honourable death’: the honours paid in ancient Sparta to dead war-heroes and mothers dying in child-birth. 27 Metaxia Papapostolou ‘Honourable death’: the honours paid in ancient Sparta to dead war-heroes and mothers dying in child-birth.

title: “Passing away” or “passing through”? Changing funerary attitudes in the Peloponnese at the MBA/LBA transition
